name: WorkProductivity
title: Work Productivity
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values represent question terms about work productivity.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have answered questions about work productivity.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Work Productivity.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Work Productivity.)

contains.display: How much did pain interfere with your ability to work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How often are you less effective at work due to your fatigue (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How often did your fatigue make it difficult to organize your thoughts when doing things at work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
How often did your fatigue limit you at work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
Due to your fatigue were you less effective at work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
To what degree did your fatigue make it difficult to organize your thoughts when doing things at work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
I was satisfied with how much work I can do (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
I was satisfied with my ability to do the work that is really important to me (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
I was satisfied with my ability to work (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
The quality of my work is as good as I want it to be (include work at home) in past 7 days [PROMIS]
Are you limited in how long you can work or do other activities because of your vision [PhenX]
During the past 30 days, how many days out of 30 were you totally unable to work or carry out your normal activities because of these feelings [Kessler 6 Distress]
Have these symptoms interfered with your ability to work, to be with others, or to function in other areas of life [PhenX]
Because of your headaches on how many days in the last 3 months did you miss work or school [PhenX]
Because of your headaches on how many days in the last 3 months was your productivity at work or school reduced by half or more [PhenX]
Does this loss of sleep affect you the next day with respect to your ability to get your work done [PhenX]
How does this loss of sleep affect you the next day with respect to your ability to get your work done [PhenX]
What number describes how much your insomnia has affected your performance in school or work or your relationships with your co-workers, employers, teachers or classmates [PhenX]
I can keep up with my work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am able to do all of my usual work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am accomplishing as much as usual at work for me in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
My ability to do my work is as good as it can be in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I can do everything for work that I want to do in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am able to do all of the work that people expect me to do in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am limited in doing my work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I have to do my work for shorter periods of time than usual for me in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I feel that I am disappointing other people at work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am disappointed in my ability to work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am bothered by limitations in performing my work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
I am satisfied with my ability to work in the past 7 days [NeuroQol]
These problems have interfered with my ability to work in the past 7 days [FACIT]
During the past 4 weeks, much did pain interfere with your normal work - including both work outside the home and house work [Veterans RAND]
As a result of any emotional problems, you didn't do work or other activities as carefully as usual in the past 4 weeks [Veterans RAND]
As a result of any emotional problems, have you cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities in the past 4 weeks [Veterans RAND]
As a result of your physical health, have you had difficulty performing the work or other activities - for example, it took extra effort in the past 4 weeks [Veterans RAND]
As a result of your physical health, were you limited in the kind of work in the past 4 weeks [Veterans RAND]
As a result of your physical health, have you cut down the amount of time you spent on work or other activities in the past 4 weeks [Veterans RAND]

How much of the time did your asthma keep you from getting as much done at work, school or at home in the past 4 weeks [ACT]
Participation in working or doing household chores limited by heart failure over the past 2 weeks [KCCQ]
Current level of confidence I can keep my symptoms from interfering with the work I need to do [PROMIS]
During the past 4 weeks, because of my health situation I have problems in my work with fatigue/lack of energy [Quality of Working Life Questionnaire for Cancer Survivors]
During the past 4 weeks, I am limited in my work [Quality of Working Life Questionnaire for Cancer Survivors]
